simulator

Class ResourceSimulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulator.ResourceSimulator

  • public class ResourceSimulator
extends java.lang.Object
    ResourceSimulator simulates the behaviour of a resource system to test our server.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

    • Method Detail

      • postResource

        public int postResource(java.lang.String path,
                        java.lang.String value)
        Simulates the processing of a post request. In this simulation POST will modify the resource if found or return a NOT_FOUND error
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the resource
        value - the new value for the resource
        Returns:
        The int code of the operation result, it can be :
        • NOT_FOUND if no resource was found
        • CHANGED if the operation was successful

      • putResource

        public int putResource(java.lang.String path,
                       java.lang.String value)
        Simulates the processing of a put request.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the resource
        value - The value for the resource
        Returns:
        The int code of the operation result, it can be :
        • CREATED if a new resource have been created
        • CHANGED if a resources have been changed

      • deleteResource

        public int deleteResource(java.lang.String path)
        Simulates the processing of a delete request.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the resource
        Returns:
        The int code of the operation result, it can be :
        • NOT_FOUND if no resource was found
        • SUCCESS if the operation was successful

      • getResource

        public java.lang.String getResource(java.lang.String path)
        Simulates the processing of a get request.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the resource
        Returns:
        the resource, can be null if nothing was found

      • getInstance

        public static ResourceSimulator getInstance()
        Gets instance.
        Returns:
        the instance
